title: P!NK to be awarded 'The People's Champion of 2019' at the E! People's Choice Awards
text:
(CNN) P!NK is set to receive "The People's Champion of 2019" award at next month's E! People's Choice Awards.

The singer will be recognized for her work alongside No Kid Hungry, Make-a-Wish Foundation, Planned Parenthood, REVERB, Autism Speaks, Human Rights Campaign and as an ambassador for UNICEF.

She's also nominated this year for female artist of 2019 and for the concert tour of the year.

"There are so many wonderful organizations and individuals doing extraordinary things in our communities every single day," the singer said in a statement. "These are our everyday warriors and champions. They teach us and our children that it's cool to be kind and that change is possible. I feel honored to be a small part of that change and will continue to be a champion for the truth and for open minds and open hearts."

"P!NK's ability to capture a global audience with her music and also encourage them to act on behalf of important causes that affects humankind is awe-inspiring," said Jen Neal, General Manager, E! News, Live Events and Lifestyle Digital. "As an activist who inspires change for the better, she is the epitome of a People's Champion, and we are humbled to present her with this award."
